items.sentence: I\'m planning on going to Tom\'s party tonight.
I don\'t understand what all the fuss is about.
Tom wondered why Mary didn\'t want to help him.
I\'m thinking of having dinner at six o\'clock.
I asked the waitress for another cup of coffee.
What makes you think Tom hasn\'t done that yet?
I can\'t remember exactly what Tom was wearing.
I can\'t remember the last time I spoke to you.
I wouldn\'t have told Tom if I didn\'t have to.
Tom said he had no intention of leaving Boston.
Tom and Mary were playing on the teeter-totter.
It took me three hours to get here from Boston.
When\'s the last time you ate homemade cookies?
Tom still has the knapsack his father gave him.
It looks as if Tom won\'t go to Boston with us.
Tom lives in Boston with his wife and children.
Tom splits his time between Boston and Chicago.
Tom doesn\'t like to leave anything unfinished.
Tom doesn\'t remember what happened that night.
It never occurred to me that this might happen.
